content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For correct document circulation and convenience of correspondence there is a set of distribution groups (DGs) in Outlook. These DGs are united into groups, forming the EPAM Global Address List and can be seen in the Outlook Address book in the drop-down list \\\"Show Names from the\\\". Distribution Groups (DGs) are also traditionally called Distribution Lists (DLs).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please review the main information about Distributions Groups here and pay a special attention to different group types: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/SoBsa\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distribution Groups overview\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SD PC is mostly involved in managing DGs in On-Premises AD. For more information about Azure AD groups please check the following article: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/Ty0ZZg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Azure AD groups\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
